name: R5-TaskStatus-R4-TaskStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 TaskStatus into a FHIR R4 TaskStatus

element.display: The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.

target.display: The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.

element.display: The task is not yet ready to be acted upon.

target.display: The task is not yet ready to be acted upon.

element.display: The task should never have existed and is retained only because of the possibility it may have used.

target.display: The task should never have existed and is retained only because of the possibility it may have used.

element.display: The task was attempted but could not be completed due to some error.

target.display: The task was attempted but could not be completed due to some error.

element.display: The task has been started but is not yet complete.

target.display: The task has been started but is not yet complete.

element.display: The task has been started but work has been paused.

target.display: The task has been started but work has been paused.

element.display: The task is ready to be performed, but no action has yet been taken.  Used in place of requested/received/accepted/rejected when request assignment and acceptance is a given.

target.display: The task is ready to be performed, but no action has yet been taken.  Used in place of requested/received/accepted/rejected when request assignment and acceptance is a given.

element.display: A potential performer has claimed ownership of the task and is evaluating whether to perform it.

target.display: A potential performer has claimed ownership of the task and is evaluating whether to perform it.

element.display: The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

target.display: The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

element.display: The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.

target.display: The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.
